statements: SELECT * FROM articles;
SELECT title, content FROM articles WHERE bias_category = 'political';
SELECT article_id, title FROM articles ORDER BY article_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM articles WHERE bias_category = 'social' AND title LIKE '%news%';
SELECT MAX(article_id) AS max_article_id FROM articles;
SELECT * FROM articles WHERE bias_category = 'political' ORDER BY article_id DESC;
SELECT title, content FROM articles WHERE bias_category = 'social' ORDER BY title ASC;
SELECT article_id, title, content FROM articles WHERE bias_category = 'economic' ORDER BY article_id ASC;
SELECT title, bias_category FROM articles WHERE bias_category = 'political' AND content LIKE '%election%';
SELECT * FROM articles WHERE bias_category = 'social' ORDER BY article_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM articles WHERE article_id = 1;
SELECT title, content FROM articles WHERE political_affiliation = 'Conservative';
SELECT article_id, title, political_affiliation FROM articles ORDER BY article_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM articles WHERE political_affiliation != 'Neutral' AND content LIKE '%election%';
SELECT title, content, political_affiliation FROM articles WHERE article_id > 5 AND political_affiliation = 'Liberal' ORDER BY title ASC;
SELECT * FROM articles WHERE article_id = 1 AND political_affiliation = 'left'
SELECT article_id, title FROM articles WHERE political_affiliation = 'right' ORDER BY article_id DESC
SELECT article_id, title, content FROM articles WHERE political_affiliation IN ('left', 'center') ORDER BY title ASC
SELECT a.article_id, a.title, b.category_name FROM articles a JOIN bias_categories b ON a.article_id = b.category_id WHERE b.category_name = 'Bias Category 1'
SELECT COUNT(article_id) AS total_articles FROM articles
SELECT * FROM articles ORDER BY article_id ASC;
SELECT title, author FROM articles WHERE bias_category = 'left';
SELECT content FROM articles WHERE author = 'Jane Doe';
SELECT * FROM political_parties ORDER BY ideology DESC;
SELECT party_name, ideology FROM political_parties WHERE party_name LIKE '%democrat%';
SELECT title, author, bias_category FROM articles WHERE author = 'John Doe' ORDER BY bias_category ASC;
SELECT * FROM articles WHERE bias_category IN ('left','right') AND author LIKE 'S%' ORDER BY article_id DESC;

SELECT title, content, party_name FROM articles JOIN article_bias ON articles.article_id = article_bias.article_id JOIN political_parties ON article_bias.party_id = political_parties.party_id WHERE ideology = 'Liberal' ORDER BY article_id ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT author FROM articles WHERE bias_category = 'neutral' OR bias_category = 'center' ORDER BY author ASC;

SELECT article_id, title, ideology FROM articles JOIN article_bias ON articles.article_id = article_bias.article_id JOIN political_parties ON article_bias.party_id = political_parties.party_id WHERE ideology <> 'Conservative' ORDER BY article_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM BiasCategories;
SELECT category_name FROM BiasCategories ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT title, content, bias_category_id FROM Articles WHERE bias_category_id = 2;
SELECT username, email FROM Users WHERE id = 1;
SELECT Users.username, BiasCategories.category_name FROM Users JOIN BiasCategories ON Users.id = BiasCategories.id;
SELECT * FROM Users;
SELECT id, username FROM Users ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT title, content FROM Articles WHERE bias_category_id = 2;
SELECT Users.username, BiasCategories.category_name FROM Users JOIN BiasCategories ON Users.id = BiasCategories.id;
SELECT Articles.title, UserPreferences.bias_category_id FROM Articles JOIN UserPreferences ON Articles.bias_category_id = UserPreferences.bias_category_id GROUP BY Articles.title HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT * FROM articles;
SELECT title, author FROM articles WHERE bias_category = 'Left';
SELECT article_id, author, title, bias_category FROM articles ORDER BY author ASC, title DESC;
SELECT article_id, bias_category FROM articles WHERE author = 'John Doe' OR author = 'Jane Smith';
SELECT title, content FROM articles WHERE bias_category = 'Right' LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM articles ORDER BY article_id DESC;
SELECT title, author FROM articles WHERE bias_category='Conservative';
SELECT * FROM articles WHERE author LIKE 'J%';
SELECT title, bias_name FROM articles JOIN article_bias ON articles.article_id = article_bias.article_id JOIN political_bias ON article_bias.bias_id = political_bias.bias_id;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE user_id IN (1, 3, 5);
